pageProps.title: Car Yard Cleaning Service
pageProps.shortDesc: Our car yard cleaning service is by far our most popular service! ...
pageProps.description:
During the allocated days a team of highly experienced car yard hands will come in and:

  1. Thoroughly house each vehicle
  2. Clean each vehicle with a chamois
This will leave your yard looking great!
